title: Pharmacist and veterinarian collaboration in Klang Valley, Malaysia: A veterinarians' perception
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Ganesh Sritheran Paneerselvam, Ru Wei Lee, Muhammad Junaid Farrukh, Yousef Mohammed A. Alhamda, Sulaiman Mohammed Alsultan, Pakhrur Razi, Khang Wen Goh, Long Chiau Ming
